src:
Novosađani nastavljaju dominaciju u svetskom baksetu
03 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Nemanja
Basketaši Novog Sada osvojili su FIBA 3X3 Svetsku turneju u japanskoj Ucinomiji savladavši ekipu Prinstona iz Sjedinjenih Američkih Država rezultatom 21:17.
Novosađani su posle slabijeg starta godine u kojoj su osvojili dva mastersa, za razliku od prošle gde su imali skor od 32:0, uspeli da savladaju Amerikance u finalu i tako dodaju još jedan trofej u svoj kabinet.
Najbolji basketaš sveta Dušan Domović Bulut je sa sedam poena predvodio pobednički sastav, a pratio ga je Tamaš Ivošev sa pet.



Za najkorisnijeg igrača turnira proglašen je upravo Ivošev, koji je postigao 30 poena.
Ovo je četvrti put da Novi Sad osvaja Svetski turnir, nakon što su to učinili 2014, 2015. i 2018. godine.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Newcomers continue to dominate the world wide box
03 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Nemanja
Novi Sad Basketball Players won the FIBA 3X3 World Tour in Japan's Ucinomia by beating the United States Princeton team with a score of 21:17.
After a poor start to the year in which they won two Masters, unlike last year where they had a score of 32: 0, the residents of Novi Sad were able to beat the Americans in the final and thus add another trophy to their cabinet.
The best basketball player of the world Dusan Domovic Bulut led the winning squad with seven points, followed by Tamas Ivoshev with five.



Ivoshev, who scored 30 points, was named the most useful player of the tournament.
This is the fourth time Novi Sad has won the World Tournament, after doing so in 2014, 2015 and 2018.
